/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that stretch into the distance. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
